site.title: Octopus Electrical & HVAC
site.description: Experts in house wiring and rewiring... Done once, Done right!

heading.en: Experts in house wiring and rewiring, switchboard upgrade, appliance installation, HVAC and EV charger installation.
heading.zh: 专业提供家用电路布线与重布线、配电箱升级、家电安装、暖通空调及电动汽车充电桩安装。

subheading.en: Master Electrician Around you! Done once, Done right!
subheading.zh: 资深电工，专业可靠，一次到位！

cta.en: Call us today for FREE QUOTE!

description.en: Professional electrical installation, maintenance, and repair services. From house wiring and rewiring to switchboard upgrades and appliance installations.
description.zh: 专业电气安装、维护和维修服务。从家庭布线和重新布线到配电箱升级和家电安装。

description.en: Heating, ventilation, and air conditioning installation and maintenance. Keep your home comfortable year-round with our expert HVAC services.
description.zh: 暖通空调安装和维护服务。通过我们专业的暖通空调服务，让您的家一年四季都舒适宜人。

description.en: Electric vehicle charger installation for your home or business. Fast, reliable, and safe charging solutions for the future of transportation.
description.zh: 为您的家庭或企业提供电动汽车充电桩安装。快速、可靠、安全的充电解决方案，迎接交通运输的未来。
